properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland.
properties.longDescription: The property comprises two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior. The rear garden is mainly laid to lawn with established flower and shrub borders.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
properties.longDescription: The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms. This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee.

properties.description: Stunning four bedroom detached Victorian family home with original features and modern conveniences throughout.
properties.longDescription: This beautiful property offers spacious accommodation over three floors including four generous bedrooms, three reception rooms, and a stunning kitchen/dining room extension. The property retains many original Victorian features including high ceilings, period fireplaces, and ornate coving. Modern additions include underfloor heating, a contemporary bathroom suite, and a state-of-the-art kitchen with integrated Bosch appliances. The master bedroom benefits from an en-suite shower room and built-in wardrobes. Outside, the property boasts a beautifully landscaped south-facing garden, off-street parking for three cars, and a detached garage.

properties.description: Modern one bedroom apartment in sought-after development with excellent transport links to central London.
properties.longDescription: This contemporary apartment is located on the third floor of a well-maintained purpose-built block. The open-plan living area features floor-to-ceiling windows providing abundant natural light and access to a private balcony with city views. The modern kitchen is fully fitted with integrated appliances. The double bedroom offers built-in storage, and the bathroom features a three-piece suite with overhead shower. Additional benefits include secure entry system, lift access, allocated parking space, and communal gardens. The property is ideally situated just 0.3 miles from the station with direct trains to London Bridge in 15 minutes.

properties.description: Exceptional five bedroom executive family home with landscaped gardens and home office in prestigious location.
properties.longDescription: This outstanding property offers luxury living with over 3000 sq ft of accommodation. The ground floor features a grand entrance hall, formal living room, separate dining room, family room, and a magnificent kitchen/breakfast room with bi-fold doors to the garden. There is also a utility room, cloakroom, and a separate home office/study. The first floor comprises a master bedroom suite with dressing room and en-suite bathroom, two further double bedrooms with en-suite facilities, and a family bathroom. The second floor offers two additional bedrooms and a shower room. The property benefits from underfloor heating, air conditioning, integrated sound system, and electric gates. The beautifully landscaped rear garden includes a paved patio area, lawn, and mature planting.

properties.description: Spacious three bedroom duplex apartment with private terrace and modern fixtures throughout.
properties.longDescription: This impressive duplex apartment spans the fifth and sixth floors of a prestigious development. The lower level features an expansive open-plan living/dining area with access to a private terrace, a contemporary kitchen with premium appliances, and a guest WC. The upper level houses three well-proportioned bedrooms including a master suite with en-suite shower room and fitted wardrobes. The family bathroom features a four-piece suite with separate bath and shower cubicle. Additional features include video entry system, residents' gymnasium, 24-hour concierge, and secure underground parking. The development is perfectly positioned close to shops, restaurants, and excellent transport connections.

properties.description: Charming two bedroom cottage with character features and beautiful cottage garden in village setting.
properties.longDescription: This delightful period cottage offers cozy and characterful accommodation perfect for a couple or small family. The ground floor features a welcoming entrance hall, a bright living room with exposed beams and feature fireplace, and a farmhouse-style kitchen/dining room with stable door to the garden. Upstairs, there are two double bedrooms and a family bathroom with Victorian-style suite. The property retains many original features including wooden floors, exposed brickwork, and traditional casement windows. Outside, the cottage garden is a real feature with a paved patio area, lawn, vegetable patch, and mature borders filled with established plants and shrubs. There is also a timber shed and side access. Located in a sought-after village with local amenities and good schools.
